name: Impoverished Starfighter
description:
Developed for Ludum Dare 28.

In Impoverished Starfighter, you are tasked with the goal of saving the universe (in a 2-stage bullet hell affair, naturally) - but due to diminished defense budgets as a result of extended world peace, you have a budget of exactly 1 dollar to build your dream starfighter and go forth.

Graphics taken from here

Music taken from the mod archive :

  • choke.it - Jakim
  • kitrock.it - Nobuyuki
  • mrgdark.xm - MrGamer
  • SHADOW.XM - Elwood
  • 2UNLIMIT.MOD

If any of these attributions is incorrect or you would like to have a track removed, contact me.
